Package ca.ualberta.c301w19t14.onebook.activities

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AddActivity
    This class adds a book to the database after the owner scans a ISBN or manually inputs the book's descriptors.
    CameraActivity
    This class opens up the camera to scan a ISBN.
    EditBookActivity
    This class allows edits/updates to books that have been inputted into the database.
    EditUserActivity
    This class allows a user to edit their account information.
    MainActivity
    This class implements the main functionality of the app.
    MapsActivity
    This class will set/view the pickup location on a Google Maps instance.
    MessageActivity
    This class implements the chat view for the messaging functionality of the app.
    ScanIsbnActivity
    This class implements a scanner for ISBN codes.
    SearchingActivity
    This class allows a user to do a key word search on a book title Currently only allows keyword searches on title, but we need to update it to include author, description, owner, and isbn the search is currently case sensitive and we need to change that.
    UserAccountActivity
    This class shows a user's information when someone clicks on the owner of a book.
    UserLoginActivity
    This class implements the user login functionality.
    ViewBookActivity
    This class implement a view book information page.
    ViewRequestsActivity
    This class shows all the requests on a book.
